CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Term_Transfer_Stopped__c )) , "Term/Transfer Stopped"&BR()& ( IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"), "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"&BR(),"")&
IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"), "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"&BR(),"") &
IF( Flag_Notes_as_Important__c ==True, "See 401k Plan Asset Transfer Notes"&BR(), "")
) , ( IF( ISPICKVAL( Discrepancy__c , "Yes") && ISBLANK( Discrepancy_Closed_Date__c ) , "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy"&BR(), "") & IF( Last_Check_Date__c > Today(), "Future Last Check Date"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK (Date_NPR_Callout_Sent_to_CPR__c)) && ISBLANK( Retention_Call_Completed__c ) , "CPR NPR Callout"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Forfeitures_Send_to_CAM__c )) && ISBLANK( Plan_Liquidation_Complete_Date__c ), "Plan Liquidation"&BR(),"") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Valuation_Edit_Sent_to_CAM_Date__c )) && ISBLANK( Valuation_Edit_Complete_Date__c ), "Resolve Valuation Edit Issue"&BR(),"")& IF(ISPICKVAL ( SDBA_Balance_Issue__c, "Yes" ) && ISBLANK( SDBA_Balance_Issue_Resolved__c), "SDBA Balance Issue"&BR(),"")& IF(ISPICKVAL ( Asset_Liquidation_Issue__c, "Yes" ) && ISBLANK( Asset_Liquidation_Issue_Complete__c ),"Resolve Plan Liquidation Issue"&BR(),"")& IF( Flag_Notes_as_Important__c ==True, "See 401k Plan Asset Transfer Notes"&BR(), "")& IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Group_Notified__c )) && ISBLANK( Date_Audit_Issue_Resolved__c ), "Audit Issue"&BR(),"") & IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"), "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll"&BR(),"")& IF(ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"), "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll"&BR(),"")& IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Wire_Returned__c )) && ISBLANK( Date_of_Wire_Resolution__c ) , "Wire Returned"&BR(), "")& IF( ISPICKVAL( Stable_Value_Funds__c , "Yes") && ISBLANK( Stable_Value_Fund_Waiver_Approved__c ) , "Stable Value Funds"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Sent_to_CAM_to_Liquidate_Assets__c )) && ISBLANK( Plan_Liquidation_Complete_Date__c )&& ISBLANK( Asset_Liquidation_Issue_Date__c ) , "Asset Liquidation"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Sent_to_CAM_to_Liquidate_Assets__c )) && ISBLANK( Plan_Liquidation_Complete_Date__c )&& NOT(ISBLANK( Asset_Liquidation_Issue_Date__c ))&&ISBLANK( Asset_Liquidation_Issue_Resolved__c ), "Asset Liquidation"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Date_Sent_to_CAM_to_Liquidate_Assets__c )) && ISBLANK( Plan_Liquidation_Complete_Date__c )&& NOT(ISBLANK( Asset_Liquidation_Issue_Date__c ))&&NOT(ISBLANK( Asset_Liquidation_Issue_Resolved__c )) , "Asset Liquidation Issue Resolved - Waiting on Liquidation"&BR(), "") & IF(NOT (ISBLANK ( Send_to_Trade_Rec_to_Conf_Liquid_Ammoun__c )) && ISBLANK(Trade_Confirm_Amt_Approval__c), "Confirm Liquidation Amount"&BR(),"") &
IF( ISPICKVAL( Loans__c , "Yes") && ISBLANK( Loans_Cleared_from_Sungard__c ) , "Clear Loans from Sungard"&BR(), "") ) )
CustomField.label: Pending Transfer Tasks
